ItemType.name: laser amplifier
ItemType.description: Laser amplifiers are used to repair and upgrade laser weapons.

ItemType.name: kinetic upgrade
ItemType.description: Kinetic upgrades increase the damage of a kinetic weapon.

ItemType.name: defective weapon enhancement ROM
ItemType.description: Because of a manufacturing defect, this ROM ionizes any weapon it is intalled on.

Language.Text: This is a defective weapon enhancement ROM.
The ROM has no effect on your damaged %weapon%.
The defective ROM reset your %weapon%, restoring it to normal.
The %weapon% has lost its previous enhancement.
Fortunately, the %weapon% is too advanced to be affected.

ItemType.name: weapon optimizer ROM
ItemType.description: This upgrade ROM increases a weapon's rate of fire. It is compatible with weapons up to level 6.

Language.Text: This upgrade ROM increases a weapon's rate of fire.

ItemType.name: particle source upgrade
ItemType.description: This weapon upgrade increases the power of particle beams.

ItemType.name: weapon efficiency ROM
ItemType.description: This upgrade ROM reduces a weapon's power consumption. It is compatible with weapons up to tech level 10.

Language.Text: This upgrade ROM decreases a weapon's power consumption.

ItemType.name: hexagene booster
ItemType.description: This high-explosive upgrade increases the damage done by blast weapons.

ItemType.name: ion power capacitor
ItemType.description: Ion power capacitors are used to increase the destructive power of ion weapons.

ItemType.name: tritium injector
ItemType.description: This weapon upgrade increases the damage done by thermo weapons.
